original_title: Man sets fire to house over family dispute
original_body_lines: A man has set fire to his house in Kadalana, Moratuwa over a dispute with his wife.
No casualties were reported although the house was gutted in the fire.
The wife and the two kids of the man in question had been to a relative’s place at the time of the incident.
Meanwhile, the wife has lodged a complaint with the police about the incident.
